revisionDesc.change: Finalized - ready
Vote - AcceptText - Fine.
Vote - AcceptText - All three corrections are justified and appear properly entered.

Submit - The contract for loan of money ends with line 26. Then in the bottom margin a new text appears perpendicular to the main body of the contract. This has been marked up accordingly, and noted in the commentary. The commentary also notes the presence of writing between lines 27 and 28, which is not recorded either in the ed.pr. or in the online edition. Finally, at the end of line 28, προαιρέτῃ in its entirety is visible on the image. I've therefore changed προαιρέ[τῃ -ca.?- ] to προαιρέτ̣ῃ .
Finalized - ready
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Remove diaeresis over iota in line 9.
Submit - Staurogram added to line 1. Line 2: μετὰ τὴν ὑπατείαν (understood by the authors of CSBE ed. 1 and 2 ) added to apparatus; diaeresis above ὑπατείαν also inserted. Line 4: tick added after ιη
Automated file split into individual parts by distinct HGV numbers.
Deleted original file stud.pal.20.123. For file history see https://github.com/papyri/idp.data/commits/master/DDB_EpiDoc_XML/stud.pal/stud.pal.20/stud.pal.20.123.xml.
rationalized languages in langUsage
changed editor names to URIs
changed type=inWord to break=no
Automatically updated revision description
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
updated markup for fractions (rend=tick)
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Automated split from transcoder files

item.p: This and the following lines are written perpendicular to the main body of the preceding contract. They relate to the text on the back and are in the same hand, Stud.Pal. 20 123v.
In the space above this line the writer has repeatedly scribbled a figure resembling zeta, similar to that in φϙζ at the end of the preceding line.
